null Dallas Police Department Incident Report

null null Dallas Police Department Incident Report Using data from the Dallas Open Data portal this report is intended to summarize recent Dallas police department incidents. This report is intended to be updated once a month. An important caveat to the data presented within is the exclusion of all incidents involving juveniles. counts are subject to change over time. In order to keep this report concise only a select number of incidents classified as Group A will be included. Murder & Non-negligent Manslaughter Violent Gun Crime Aggravated Assault (NFV) Robbery (Business) Robbery (Individual) Burglary (Residence) Burglary (Business) Incident records from the Dallas Open Data portal currently exclude certain incident types and may be subject to change over time.

City of Dallas Select Group A Incidents Overview Selected Group A Incidents for September 2021

City of Dallas Select Group A Incidents Overview The table below contains an overview of selected group A incidents for the most recent complete month (September). Data focuses on the count of incidents within the full month compared to the same month for the previous year and a five year average for the specified month. incidents-over-time.html
Incidents Over Time Line Graph of Total Incidents Over Time Line Graph of Incidents by Time of Day Violent Gun Crime Rate Change in Violent Gun Crime

Incidents Over Time Line Graph of Total Incidents Over Time Line graph below visualizes of selected group A incidents since 2017. Line Graph of Incidents by Time of Day Violent Gun Crime Rate This map displays the violent gun crime rate (per 10,000 residents) for the past 12 months by census tract. Change in Violent Gun Crime This map displays the average percent change in violent gun crimes for the past 12 months in comparison to an average of incidents over the last 5 years. All incidents are aggregated to a tenth mile width grid.
